content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
OH MY GD this place is so good. The guy that took my order was so nice, and the food. Let me tell you something. I had the salmon over rice, and the fish just melted away in my mouth. The flavor was incredible, it made me try to recreate the dish and I haven't been able to do anything close to what they've done. And their Korean army stew was hearty, flavorful, and deliciously spicy! I'll definitely be coming back. Plus I live their take out containers
